FuncDef:
The l2-aware enable command enables the L2NAT function in a NAT instance.
The undo l2-aware enable command disables the L2NAT function in a NAT instance.
By default, L2NAT is disabled in each NAT instance.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A NAT device processes packets based on user IDs. Because the private IP addresses on a CPE are different and the private IP addresses on different CPEs sometimes overlap, user identifiers are needed to differentiate and manage CPEs.
Precautions
This command applies only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E.
